_sText:
This is completely untested, because combatsurf is apparently dead as a dodo.

If you find any bugs with it, feel free to message me on steam @Razersurf or discord @Razersurf #6154

Started it ages ago, didnt get around to finishing it up until now. Decided to release in spite of it being a dead gamemode because I think its cool and I didnt want it to rot on my harddrive.

Go have fun :)

BOOM!

You wanted a change from skill maps? You got one! You wanted Something new? You got it! Did you want a change from the symmetrical arena layouts of combat maps of old? I don't know, but you got it ANYWAY! Surf_cityscape. It's what a city would like if it was made for surfing! You literally have no choice but to LOVE THIS MAP.

BOOM!

In all seriousness, i just made this map for a change. It's dev textured, as you can see, which i'm not too thrilled about, but i'm more lazy than i am annoyed, so there we go. It's quite large, and i didn't really think about the layout too much. Take a look at the video to see how it surfs, or try it out yourself. I'm sure there will be a few problems, but my biggest worry is that people will find it too hard to surf, either in difficulty, or just 'cause of poor ramp placement (although maybe not; i find it fairly easy, as you will see on the aforementioned video). Have fun. Stay surfing. I want to see more combat maps. Boom!

my first surf map

Criticism and any kind of opinion is highly welcome

SURF_ADVERSE by Target Practice - This map is an arena surf. - The purpose of the map is for each team to capture all four bases and hold them. - An excellent arena map for DM servers. [NOTE: round-times are meant to be long] - Telehopping is incorporated into the map. Enter the teleport at speed to gain an advantage. - Try your hand at grabbing the AWP and M249. - If you have the skills then show off some tricks in some excellent spots in the map. _________________________________________________ THIS MAP IS SPONSORED BY www.Surf-Velocity.com Clan Leader: WireleZz _________________________________________________ BASE POINTS ...In order to capture a base you must stand on the point for 5 seconds until all the lights have changed and the sound plays. ...For each base capture your team will recieve one point. ...You can view the scores by pressing your TAB key and viewing the SCORE for each team. ...Once your team has all 4 bases then your team will gain 1 point every 10 seconds until you lose a base. TELEHOPPING ...In order to telehop you must gain speed on the boosts and maintain this speed when entering the teleport. _________________________________________________ - Many thanks go to DragonRock and Mapjunkies. - Special thanks goes to Archangel for all his help, advice, and wisdom. - Further thanks to Ryan S. - Thanks to Icecreamlock for his unleveled bug-spotting abilities. - I appreciate all the beta testers who took part in playing the private tests throughout the making of this map. ________________________________________________ INSTALLATION: - To install the map you will need to copy&paste (or extract the contents of the .rar if you wish) the .BSP file (surf_adverse.bsp) into the 'maps' folder. - To get to this folder you will need to go into: - Program Files>Steam>Steamapps>counter-strike source>cstrike>maps. - The .bsp file included in the download should go in your maps folder. - Load up the game and you should be able to play it. _________________________________________________ If you have any problems or queries about this map then feel free to contact me: - xfire: targetpractice808 - STEAM Friends: Target Practice Enjoy the map. _________________________________________________ TRAILER:

_sText:
Just a map that i randomly make in CSS's Hammer World Editor (E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam1\stemapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\bin\), map for battle 1v1, 1v2, 2v2, etc.

To install just read README.txt

What is Rush? ============= Rush is a game type from the battlefield series, notably battlefield bad company 2 and battlefield 3. The game type is simple: attackers destroy the bomb sites and the defenders disarm/protect them. The game consists of 3 stages, with 2 bomb sites in each stage. A majority of the map is locked off to begin with, and the attackers must destroy the 2 bomb sites in stage one before the second stage is unlocked. Once all 3 bomb sites have been cleared, the attackers are declared the winners and the game is restarted/level is changed. Every time an attacker spawns, a ticket is deducted from their pot. If the attackers lose 120 tickets before they progress to the next stage, they lose. Tickets are reset after each stage. The only thing I would recommend is a mod that controls respawning and weapons. A classes script would be a benefit. The Map ======= This is the first map I have built from scratch for the purpose of Rush. It is fair large (as you will be able to see by the screen shots) and is based in a military style station. The first stage is based at the top levels, prior to entering the facility. The second stage is based in a laboratory that is accessed via an elevator or stairwell. The third stage is based in an underground railway station. The map: developer ================== I have used area portals to block off the stages, with assistance from hint/skip brushes. The FPS seems to remain consistent on my PC, and have had no complaints from any of the people who BETA tested the map with me. The mechanics of the game are from a prefab i created (available in stand alone hammer version or script assisted version). The spawn points are based in a sealed off skybox in the world, and each spawn is surrounded by teleporters. As a player spawns, they are pointed towards the relevant destination, depending on what part of the map they are up to. Triggers are used to change the spawn points as stages are cleared. If the terrorist enters the teleporter, a math_counter is used to measure remaining tickets. The bomb sites are a simple mechanic. They consist of:
2 x Logic_timer
2 x Math_counter
3 x Logic_relay
1 x team filter
2 x buttons
and a series of effects. For those of you who script in eventscripts, I have added custom events: [CLICK HERE TO SEE THE EVENTS](http://code.eventscripts.com/845233 "CLICK HERE TO SEE THE EVENTS") This will allow you to create custom notifications, hud hints etc to enhance the experience of the map. Tech specs ========== Spawn slots: 44
Total dimensions of select all: 17,548.4 x 15,947.4
Custom textures: Yes
Bomb timer count down: 30 seconds
Time before progression: 10 seconds

What is Rush? ============= Rush is a game type from the battlefield series, notably battlefield bad company 2 and battlefield 3. The game type is simple: attackers destroy the bomb sites and the defenders disarm/protect them. The game consists of 3 stages, with 2 bomb sites in each stage.
A majority of the map is locked off to begin with, and the attackers must destroy the 2 bomb sites in stage one before the second stage is unlocked. Once all 3 bomb sites have been cleared, the attackers are declared the winners and the game is restarted/level is changed. Every time an attacker spawns, a ticket is deducted from their pot. If the attackers lose 120 tickets before they progress to the next stage, they lose. Tickets are reset after each stage. The only thing I would recommend is a mod that controls respawning and weapons. A classes script would be a benefit. The Map ======= I have based this rush map in a Skyscraper. Terrorists enter from the roof of the building while CT's start inside. There are 3 stages in this map: the office, the lab and the car park. Each stage must be cleared to progress to the next. There are multiple entry points into each map, giving a strategic value to both the attackers and the defenders. Stages: 3
Bombs per stage: 2
Bomb Timer: 30 seconds
Attacker Spawn tickets: 120
Progression delay: 10 seconds The map: developer ================== The Rush mechanics are taken care of by my prefab, but require a mod to allow respawning and weapons. The map automatically hooks round end until the map is cleared, or the tickets are reduced to 0.

What is Rush?

Rush is a game type from the battlefield series, notably battlefield bad company 2 and battlefield 3.

The game type is simple: attackers destroy the bomb sites and the defenders disarm/protect them.

The game consists of 3 stages, with 2 bomb sites in each stage.
A majority of the map is locked off to begin with, and the attackers must destroy the 2 bomb sites in stage one before the second stage is unlocked.

Once all 3 bomb sites have been cleared, the attackers are declared the winners and the game is restarted/level is changed.

Every time an attacker spawns, a ticket is deducted from their pot. If the attackers lose 120 tickets before they progress to the next stage, they lose. Tickets are reset after each stage.

The only thing I would recommend is a mod that controls respawning and weapons. A classes script would be a benefit.

The Map

This is my latest Rush map for CS:S. It is based in a city and starts from a neighbourhood and progresses through to until ending in a shopping center.
After hours of BETA testing with the DTK Community, we have finally worked out the bugs and I am happy to release this map in its final stage.
I tried to make it as balanced as possible on all stages and have included multiple points of access to each bomb site on each stage, eliminating bottle necking for the most part.

Stages: 3
Bombs per stage: 2
Bomb Timer: 30 seconds
Attacker Spawn tickets: 120
Progression delay: 10 seconds

The map: developer

I have broken up the three stages with closed area portals, ensuring high FPS throughout the map. When stage one is cleared, the AP is opened for stage 2, and again for stage 3 once stage 2 is cleared.

The Rush mechanics are taken care of by my prefab, but require a mod to allow respawning and weapons. The map automatically hooks round end until the map is cleared, or the tickets are reduced to 0.

I normally like to test new skills inside a map, and this one was purely about optimization. I have used various tactics for optimization ranging from AP's to hint/skip brushes, occulders and shaping the skybox a certain way to stop rendering on certain parts.
Card extended, very interesting, has an area to bomb a and B. we Can say that this is a great remake of the map$2000$"for a large number of players.

#ENGLISH :
Track_speedisland is a race map for up to 20 players
A large island themed environment with a random checkpoint system!
The race consists of reaching 16 random checkpoints - 1 checkpoint gives 5 points
Drive Lamborghinis created by our team.
Vehicles can be customised with different skins and flags from around the world.


#FRENCH :

 Track_speedisland est une map de course jouable à 20 personnes
 Le thème est basé sur une île. L'originalité de la map réside dans les checkpoints aléatoires
 La course se finit après que 16 checkpoints aient été touchées. 1 Checkpoint rapporte 5 points
 Les voitures sont des lamborghini créees par nos soins.
 Vous pouvez choisir les skins représentant des drapeaux de pays du monde entier.

Welcome to Pepperland!

Pepperland is a huge, cartoon styled race map delivering minutes of intense racing in an (hopefully) interesting environment. The map contains loads of custom content, mostly all the cartoon textures, but also a few models. It is also stuffed with shortcuts, speed boosts, ramps and a few secrets.

Once the fastest player finishes the map and reaches the goal, he gets to choose 1 out of 3 arenas for everyone to fight in.

Track summary/info:

- 1 lap on a huge cartoon map

- Contains lots of shortcuts, speed boosts and ramps.

- Winner chooses arena to fight in

- Supports up to 20 players

<iframe width="470" height="265" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/1sPxWhQex6U?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Notes: This map is quite big and open, resulting in very much stuff being rendered at the same time. This might unfortunately affect your fps some, especially if you have an old/bad computer.

Looking for a server to play these awesome Track maps on? :) The Metaleak community has one running pretty much 24/7. IP: 188.165.178.162:27015

Hopefully, there will use this map.

 The map is played every day on our zombie riot server, join us and you'll have a lot of fun.

zr_MkZk_proto_v1 is a small/medium size zombieriot-map.

Humans (CT's) spawn in the attic, Zombies (T's) spawn inside the nearby factory hall at two different spots.
There are also various defendable spots outside the house, zombies can reach them all (tested with bots).
Features a camera-monitor system, a hidden music-button and an unusual easteregg, there is a hint somewhere in the map.

(Also playable without ZR-mod, T's got a buyzone too.)

Further versions are coming soon.

If there are things to fix let me know in the comments.

A zombie riot map i made that can be used in zriot or other similar zombie mode (probably not zombie reloaded) servers. The map takes place in some kind of zombie hideout/sanctuary or bunker of sorts. The zombies are meant to look like they jumped the fence (originally the map would have zombies spawn on the outside of the outside area and jump down onto the grass but navmesh wouldn't work correctly), and zombies have to break through 2 layers of a door and a couple of crates in the way. There is a lot of concrete barriers and concrete bags in the way to slow down zombies and to bob in weave around them, a lot of grenades stored in the map (including smoke grenades, mostly used if poison smoke is installed like the UNLOZE or Zombiemonde zombie riot servers), has a weapon room to buy weapons and is where the ct buyzone is located and a medic room. Read me txt file for installation in dl/.rar file or file info link.

zr\_house\_v3 is a fast-paced, close quarters Zombie Riot map. It was created to be simple, yet fun. The theme of the map is a small wooden house during the night. It's creepy, it's dark, and without teamwork, it can be difficult. Hope you enjoy!
